Odoo Cloud Storage

"Cloud Storage for Fast Functions of your Odoo!"
Note:
Odoo Cloud Storage is the base module which needs to be installed first for the other Odoo Cloud Storage extensions to work properly. There is no limitation for installing other Cloud extensions.
Odoo perfectly manages the data in its backend; however, if you have ample of data then going for cloud storage becomes a mandatory option.

Free up Extra Space from your Local System

Your System is more prone to get stuck in any particular page(s) if it is stuffed with a lot of data. So, you need to free up extra space; where deleting data is not at all an option. So, storing data in the cloud is the best option that comes up in such cases.

When you store data on the cloud, it makes all the functions of your system faster.

Reachout Your Odoo Data from Anywhere

Suppose, you wish to check your Odoo data but cannot access your Odoo then you can simply check it out from the cloud storage.

Odoo Cloud Storage helps you to make your data easily accessible from anywhere; anytime.

Scale As Your Requirements Increases

The best part about cloud storage is that you can increase or decrease the space as per your requirements without complications.

The cloud storage works on the model Pay-for-what-you-use which facilitates you to scale up and down as per your requirements.

When talking about local storage then it is next to impossible to increase or decrease space whenever you want. So, improve data management in Odoo With the help of Odoo Cloud Storage.

Importing And Exporting Files In Odoo

After mapping folders, you can Import all the Files from the specific folders or from the specific object of the folder at Odoo end.

You can export files directly from a specific folder, or directly from an object. Moreover, you can also export files in bulk.

Newly Designed Dashboard to Analyze Data

You can easily access files and define default folders directly from the dashboard.

Introduced a dynamic dashboard to track the data of all the connected cloud solutions to your Odoo.

Import/Export the data of any cloud solutions directly from the dashboard.

Well-designed Donut Chart and progress bar to analyze the data.

The dashboard also offers Clickable tabs and data cards.

Easy way to define default folders and access files

The module provides the feature to set the root folder for all your Odoo attachments. Which means user can easily recognize the Odoo folder in cloud storage

And, you can easily access the files which are saved in the cloud solution directly from Odoo.

Key Features

Below is the detailed list of features for Odoo cloud integration module

Use Cloud Storages for your Odoo Data

  • Now store your Odoo Data in any Cloud Storage
  • Manage Attachment type and its size in the Cloud Storage

Create Data Directly in The Cloud

  • You can Create Folders/files in the Cloud
  • The files/folders can be used in Odoo directly

Export File(s) from Odoo to cloud

  • You can export files to the cloud
  • The files are managed properly in the cloud

Import File(s) from Odoo to cloud

  • You can Import File of a specific folder to Odoo

Data Synchronization to the cloud

  • You can dynamically sync data Model wise as well as record wise from Odoo to Cloud
  • You can sync data folder via cron scheduler in Odoo

Update Data to the Cloud

  • You can update file(s) to the cloud from Odoo
  • Or, update the whole folder to Odoo
